languages.text: {n}Маражай легко перескакивает с края платформы в рейдер и начинает осматривать его изнутри. Вы слышите щелканье и шипение, с которым друкари открывает и закрывает невидимые вам тайники в бортах воздушной лодки, а также — сдавленную ксеносскую брань.{/n}

{n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай легко перескакивает с края платформы в рейдер и начинает осматривать его изнутри. Вы слышите щелканье и шипение, с которым друкари открывает и закрывает невидимые вам тайники в бортах воздушной лодки, а также — сдавленную ксеносскую брань.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋轻盈地从平台边缘一跃而下，跃入了掠袭者战机里，开始检查着战机内部。玛拉斋不断地将战机中各种隐匿的位置打开、关上，你听到了这些装置发出的咯吱声和咔哒声，以及玛拉斋口中吐出的咒骂声。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋轻盈地从平台边缘一跃而下，跃入了掠袭者战机里，开始检查着战机内部。玛拉斋不断地将战机中各种隐匿的位置打开、关上，你听到了这些装置发出的咯吱声和咔哒声，以及玛拉斋口中吐出的咒骂声。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはデッキの端からレイダーへ軽々と飛び込み、内側から調査を始めた。デュカーリが宇宙船の船体にあるさまざまな隠し場所を開いたり閉じたりするたびに、カチカチ、シーという音と、異種族がボソリと吐く悪態が一緒に聞こえてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはデッキの端からレイダーへ軽々と飛び込み、内側から調査を始めた。デュカーリが宇宙船の船体にあるさまざまな隠し場所を開いたり閉じたりするたびに、カチカチ、シーという音と、異種族がボソリと吐く悪態が一緒に聞こえてくる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai da un ágil salto desde el borde de la plataforma, aterriza en la cubierta del incursor y comienza a inspeccionar el interior. Oyes chasquidos y silbidos mientras el drukhari abre y cierra diversos compartimentos secretos en el casco de la aeronave, maldiciendo entre dientes en su lengua xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai da un ágil salto desde el borde de la plataforma, aterriza en la cubierta del incursor y comienza a inspeccionar el interior. Oyes chasquidos y silbidos mientras el drukhari abre y cierra diversos compartimentos secretos en el casco de la aeronave, maldiciendo entre dientes en su lengua xenos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai bondit souplement du bord de la plateforme pour pénétrer dans le vaisseau et se met à l'inspecter de l'intérieur. Vous entendez force claquements et chuintements à mesure que le Drukhari ouvre, puis referme divers compartiments cachés dans la coque de l'appareil, tout en marmonnant des jurons xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai bondit souplement du bord de la plateforme pour pénétrer dans le vaisseau et se met à l'inspecter de l'intérieur. Vous entendez force claquements et chuintements à mesure que le Drukhari ouvre, puis referme divers compartiments cachés dans la coque de l'appareil, tout en marmonnant des jurons xénos.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai springt leichtfüßig vom Rand der Plattform in den Raider und beginnt, den Innenraum zu inspizieren. Du hörst, wie der Drukhari schnalzt und zischt, während er mehrere geheime Lager im Rumpf des Raumschiffs öffnet und wieder schließt. Dazu flucht er ständig auf Xenos-Art.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai springt leichtfüßig vom Rand der Plattform in den Raider und beginnt, den Innenraum zu inspizieren. Du hörst, wie der Drukhari schnalzt und zischt, während er mehrere geheime Lager im Rumpf des Raumschiffs öffnet und wieder schließt. Dazu flucht er ständig auf Xenos-Art.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, platformun kenarından baskıncıya kolaylıkla atlayarak onu içeriden incelemeye başlıyor. Drukhari'nin gökgeminin gövdesindeki gizli bölmeleri açıp kaparken homurdanarak ettiği zeno küfürleri eşliğinde tıkırtılar ve tıslamalar duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lightly leaps from the edge of the platform into the raider and begins inspecting it from the inside. You hear clicking and hissing as the Drukhari opens and closes various hidden caches in the skycraft's hull, accompanied by muttered xenos cursing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, platformun kenarından baskıncıya kolaylıkla atlayarak onu içeriden incelemeye başlıyor. Drukhari'nin gökgemi gövdesindeki gizli bölmeleri açıp kaparken homurdanarak ettiği zeno küfürleri eşliğinde tıkırtılar ve tıslamalar duyuyorsun.{/n}
